name: orgeat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet liquid made from almonds (= a type of nut that is oval in shape) that is mixed with other liquids to make drinks : Our cocktails are mixed with house-made ingredients such as grenadine and orgeat. Almond syrup (also known as orgeat syrup) can be found in supermarkets and coffee shops.
More examplesFewer examplesPut the rum, orange liqueur, lime juice, and almond syrup (orgeat) into a shaker with ice.It's a classic tiki-style drink with gin, orgeat, mint, and lime.Orgeat syrup is made with almonds, sugar, and either orange-flower water or rose water.
